channel.title: Anyone know a good buy function?
channel.description:
Well right now I'm lost my websites, ([url=http://Fireheart.net23.net]Fireheart.net23.net[/url]) grand exchange I created is perfect I have the ge itself a sell option that removes the item from your "bag" once you sell it, and it will give you money, and it adds the item to the grand exchange. see here [url=http://Fireheart.net23.net/ge.php]Fireheart.net23.net/ge.php[/url] but the buy function I have no clue on what to call and how to have the player pick what they want to buy... Anyone have some hints? I don't need a code just what I should call, I'm pretty good at php - thanks
--- Problem Fixed got a full grand exchange now :D 100% thanks Ollie
